casebody.data:
William S. MANIX, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. PETER GRAFF & CO., Inc., Defendant-Appellant. No. 424. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 6, 1932. *1069Platt, Taylor & Walker, of New York City (Eli J. Blair, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Brodek, Raphael & Eisner, of New York City (Eugene J. Raphael and Louis P. Eisner, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
